mapper.select: SELECT work_code FROM test_work_order ORDER BY work_code desc LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_work_order(work_code, emp_num, line_code, line_name, order_code, prod_name, order_amount, line_process, work_order_date, branch_name) VALUES(CONCAT('WO', LPAD(#{work_code}, 4, '0')), #{emp_num}, #{line_code}, #{line_name}, #{order_code}, #{prod_name}, #{order_amount}, #{line_process}, NOW(), #{branch_name})
